Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Tim Hortons has not made any announcement or taken any action to remove pork from its menu.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Tim Hortons has removed pork from almost all of its locations, when in fact there is no evidence to support this.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no confirmation from any news outlets or official sources.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Tim Hortons is removing pork from its menu to appease Muslim customers, without any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation could be that the claim is a satire or a false rumor, as indicated by the source labeling it as such.
